description:
Safely store your files and access them from any device

Choose folders on your computer to sync with Google Drive or backup to Google Photos, and access all of your content directly from your PC or Mac
- Added support for Apple Spotlight search for content from Google Drive. On macOS version 26.0 and above, Drive for desktop users can now use the Spotlight to access content in Google Drive, including items that were not previously browsed locally.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Update: To resolve an issue found in 116.0.0 to 116.0.4 on Windows where all desktop icons would refresh frequently for some users while running Drive for desktop, we released 116.0.6 on October 27, 2025.
